Points: Developed and deployed APIs using FastAPI, integrating with Gupshup for improved user interaction.
Utilized GPT-3.5 Turbo, GPT-4, and Mistral models to implement NLP in backend systems.
Managed Jenkins and Docker pipelines to streamline integration, testing, and deployment of backend solutions.
Utilized PostgreSQL for database management, including data handling and query execution.
Enhanced frontend pages to optimize user experience and ensure seamless backend integration.
